com.alexgilleran.icesoap.request.impl

Class ApacheSOAPRequester

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexgilleran.icesoap.request.impl.ApacheSOAPRequester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SOAPRequester

    public class ApacheSOAPRequester
extends Object
implements SOAPRequester
    Singleton implementation of SOAPRequester, using the Apache HTTP Client.
    Author:
    Alex Gilleran

        doSoapRequest in interface SOAPRequester
        Parameters:
        envelope - The SOAP envelope to send
        targetUrl - The url of the SOAP web service to communicate with.
        soapAction - The SOAP Action to perform - this is put in the SOAPAction field of the outgoing HTTP post.
        Returns:
        An InputStream representing the
        Throws:
        IOException - If an exception occurs while performing the request

      • buildHttpClient

        protected org.apache.http.client.HttpClient buildHttpClient()
        Builds an Apache HttpClient from defaults.
        Returns:
        An implementation of HttpClient

      • getSchemeRegistry

        protected org.apache.http.conn.scheme.SchemeRegistry getSchemeRegistry()
        Builds a SchemeRegistry, which determines the SocketFactory that will be used for different ports.

        This is very important because it will need to be overridden by an extension class if custom ports or factories (which are used for self-signed certificates) are to be used.

        Returns:
        A SchemeRegistry with the necessary port and factories registered.

      • buildPostRequest

        protected org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpPost buildPostRequest(String url,
                                                       SOAPEnvelope envelope,
                                                       String soapAction)
                                                            throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Builds an HttpPost request.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to POST to
        envelope - The envelope to post
        soapAction - SOAPAction for the header.
        Returns:
        An HttpPost object representing the supplied information.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - If the character encoding for the envelope is unsupported.

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
        Set the timeout for making connections to the server.
        Specified by:
        setConnectionTimeout in interface SOAPRequester
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout time in milliseconds.

      • setSocketTimeout

        public void setSocketTimeout(int timeout)
        Set the timeout for receiving data from the server - note that this takes into account time to establish a connection, send the envelope, wait for the server to process and then receive it.
        Specified by:
        setSocketTimeout in interface SOAPRequester
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout time in milliseconds.
